title: Latest windows update capped my fps at 60 in full screen but its uncapped when i use borderless??
body: anyone have any idea why and/or how to fix this? It isnt the xbox app, ive turned that off long ago and, as stated in the title, it only happens when using full screen mode

replies.body:
If you're running the windows creator update, then it may be happening due to a bug with the beta update. If that's the case, your best bet would be to revert to the most previous official windows build. 

If you're already on the normal windows build, let's use our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to see if we can narrow down what's causing those stutters.
Yeah, revert to 1607...1703 is totally crap even with game mode disabled.
